title: Vieira Caetano (Padre João)
body:
He was born in the town of Santa Cruz on December 11, 1884, and was ordained a priest in the month of June 1906, currently performing parish functions in the parish of Ponta do Sol. He has a wide and valuable collaboration in various newspapers. He was the main editor of
> Brado de Oeste
 and published the historical novel
> Da Choça ao Solar
 , whose plot unfolds on this island (1921).

1921: Publication of the novel 'Da Choça ao Solar'
